commit.message:
cgraph.c (cgraph_update_edges_for_call_stmt_node): Do not access removed node.


	* cgraph.c (cgraph_update_edges_for_call_stmt_node): Do not access
	removed node.
	* cgraphunit.c (verify_cgraph_node): Verify frequencies for match.

From-SVN: r154242

files.patch:

+	removed node.
+	* cgraphunit.c (verify_cgraph_node): Verify frequencies for match.
